a=input()
for i in range(0,a):
    cost=0
    s=raw_input()
    s=list(s)
    arrmax=[]
    c=0
    for j in range(65,91):
        if chr(j) in s:
            for k in range(0,len(s)):
                if chr(j)==s[k]:
                    c=c+1     
            arrmax.append(c)
            c=0
    for j in range(97,123):
        if chr(j) in s:
            for k in range(0,len(s)):
                if chr(j)==s[k]:
                    c=c+1
            arrmax.append(c)
            c=0
    l=len(arrmax)
    for j in range(0,l):
        if arrmax[j]%2==0:
            cost=cost+(arrmax[j]/2)
        else:
            cost=cost+(arrmax[j]/2)+1
    print cost
